name: VG_100K_2/1.jpg
caption_ori: Two men are standing on the sidewalk, talking to each other, with a tree providing shade nearby and a building with a sign in the background. A car and a van are parked on the street next to them.

name: VG_100K/2.jpg
caption_ori: A man is crossing the road in front of a red car parked on the side, with a tree alongside the road and a bike next to the car.

name: VG_100K/3.jpg
caption_ori: A girl with hair is sitting at a desk in front of a computer, with a keyboard in front of the monitor, a telephone on the desk, and a bag resting on the surface. A cable is on the floor, and a picture is hanging on the wall.

name: VG_100K/4.jpg
caption_ori: A purple couch with a frame is positioned in a living room, adorned with a pillow, next to a window, while a carpet covers the floor and a lamp stands behind the couch. A chair is placed next to a table in the room.

name: VG_100K/5.jpg
caption_ori: In a room, there is a desk with a computer monitor on it, a chair positioned near the desk, and a cable lying on the floor. A shelf is mounted on the wall, and the chair is also against the wall.

name: VG_100K/6.jpg
caption_ori: A table is set with a variety of food and drinks, including an apple, a bowl, a glass, and a pan, all arranged on the counter, alongside a bag and a container.

name: VG_100K/7.jpg
caption_ori: A woman with hair is sitting at a desk, wearing pants, with a laptop and a telephone on top of the desk, a monitor next to the keyboard, and a book placed on the desk, while a cable runs under the desk.

name: VG_100K/8.jpg
caption_ori: A man wearing a shirt and pants is sitting at a desk with a computer, his hand resting on the keyboard, while there is a picture on the wall and paper on the desk, along with a drawer.
